title: When Christmas Plans Go Wrong | A Holiday Heist | Family Christmas Movie

sources.title: When Christmas Plans Go Wrong | A Holiday Heist | Family Christmas Movie
sources.description:
When Christmas Plans Go Wrong | A Holiday Heist | Family Christmas Movie - Three seasoned thieves break into an art gallery to steal a priceless exhibit, only to be caught off guard when a group of students unexpectedly shows up. Trapped inside, the crooks must improvise, outwit the intruders, and escape with their loot while chaos, clever tricks, and holiday mishaps turn the heist into a high-stakes game of cat and mouse.

2011.  Stars: Lacey Chabert, Rick Malambri, Vivica A. Fox
